laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased to 39 mg/dL from baseline value of 22 mg/dL.
Increased to 1.8 mg/dL from baseline value of 0.9 mg/dL.

Mildly dilated left atrium, normal regional left ventricular wall motion, left ventricular ejection fraction of more than 55%, and trivial mitral regurgitation. Unchanged compared with preoperative study.
'Cove'-type ST elevations and a right bundle branch block noted in precordial leads V1 and V2, characteristic of Brugada pattern.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normalized 48 hours after the Brugada pattern was noted.
